payload.pattern: Idempotency key for safe retries. Use a client-supplied key (idempotency-key header or request ID) to deduplicate operations; store key→result server-side for the idempotency window; return cached result on replay.

occurrences.context: retry with exponential backoff—idempotency makes retries safe
circuit breaker—fail fast, then retry; idempotency ensures safe retry

payload.applicability: Operations that must not be applied twice: payments, provisioning, webhook delivery, mutable API calls
